Solar-powered devices: Solar panels can be used to charge devices, eliminating the need for batteries.
Hand-cranked devices: Hand-cranked generators can be used to power devices, eliminating the need for batteries.
Kinetic-powered devices: Kinetic energy can be harnessed from movement to power devices, such as using a generator that converts kinetic energy from walking into electrical energy.
Battery-less devices: Devices can be designed to function without batteries, using alternative power sources such as fuel cells or capacitors.
Hydrogen fuel cell devices: Hydrogen fuel cells can be used to power devices, providing a clean and renewable energy source.
